title: Can't login
body: alright hello so - oh never know how to start these- My friend who has never played league and really wants to can not. He made his account -everything okie- downloads the game -still okie-  logs in -the world has exploded-  HE CANT LOG IN. thats what im trying to say XD he has redownloaded the client many times and nothing. He's in the right region. I told him to post a discussion and he did but it wouldn't go through for some reason. pls help he really wants to play and i have no clue on how to help. Thanks

replies.body: Has your friend made an account?  If so, did he create an account in the correct region?  He may have accidentally signed up elsewhere!  Let me know.
hey thanks :D I did ask if he was in the right region but i guess i said it wrong or guess he didnt hear me? dunno but if there are any problems i will be back.
